Profile

I'm an electrical/electronic engineer graduated from Institut Teknologi Bandung, Indonesia. I love to learn about digital electronics and programming. I have interest in neuromorphic computing that make chip/processor to compute like human brain. I'm a little shy to meet new friends but can adapt well. I'm also a cheerful person.
